title: Top Places to visit in North 24 Parganas, Barasat, West Bengal
content: North 24 Parganas or sometimes North Twenty Four Parganas is a district in southern West Bengal, of eastern India. North 24 Parganas extends in the tropical zone from latitude 22º11'6" north to 23º15'2" north and from longitude 88º20' east to 89º5' east. It is bordered to Nadi

title: Top Places to visit in Paschim Medinipur, Midnapore, West Bengal
content: Paschim Medinipur district (পশ্চিম মেদিনীপুর জেলা) or West Midnapore district (also known as Midnapore West) is one of the districts of the state of West Bengal, India. title: Top Places to visit in Purba Medinipur, Tamluk, West Bengal
content: Purba Medinipur district is an administrative unit in the Indian state of West Bengal. It is the southernmost district of Medinipur division – one of the five administrative divisions of West Bengal. The headquarters in Tamluk. title: Top Places to visit in Purulia, West Bengal
content:
Purulia district is one of the twenty three districts of West Bengal state in Eastern India. Purulia is the administrative headquarters of the district. Some of the other important towns of Purulia district are Raghunathpur-Adra, Jhalida and Balarampur.

title: Top Places to visit in South 24 Parganas, Alipore, West Bengal
content: South 24 Parganas or sometimes South Twenty Four Parganas is a district in the Indian State of West Bengal, headquartered in Alipore. It is the largest district of West Bengal state by area and second largest by population. It is the sixth most populous district in India (out of 640). On one side

title: Top Places to visit in Uttar Dinajpur, Raiganj, West Bengal
content: Uttar Dinajpur is a district of the Indian state of West Bengal. Created on 1 April 1992 by the division of the erstwhile West Dinajpur district, it comprises two subdivisions: Raiganj and Islampur. Top Places to visit in Chandigarh
content: Chandigarh is a city and a union territory in India that serves as the capital of the two neighbouring states of Punjab and Haryana. title: Top Places to Visit in Dadra and Nagar Haveli
content: Dadra and Nagar Haveli is a union territory and district in western India. It is composed of two separate geographical entities: Nagar Haveli, wedged between Maharashtra and Gujarat, and, 1 km to the northwest, the smaller enclave of Dadra, which is surrounded by Gujarat. content:
